hero.headline: Professional Real Estate Services from Shinjuku
hero.tagline: Sales · Rentals · Investment | One-Stop Multilingual Consultation

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Serving both individuals and businesses in Tokyo and surrounding areas.
services.svc1Desc: Property tours, price negotiation, contract review, and financing process management.
services.svc2Desc: Multilingual support for students, foreign professionals, and corporate tenants.
services.svc3Desc: Providing ROI models, cash flow analysis, and M&A/exit strategy advice.

advantages.title: Why Choose Us
advantages.description: Reliability · Professionalism · Efficiency — Our commitment to every client.
advantages.adv1Desc: Convenient subway access for quick client meetings.
advantages.adv2Desc: Japanese / Chinese / English / Vietnamese / Nepali — seamless communication.
advantages.adv3Desc: Licensed under Tokyo Governor (1) No. 112700, transparent and traceable procedures.
advantages.adv4Desc: Data- and model-driven approach to balance risk and return.

company.pageSubtitle: Smart Eyes' philosophy, history, and team introduction
company.presidentMessage1: Thank you for your support of Smart Eyes. Since our founding in 2021, we have adhered to a 'customer first' principle in Tokyo's real estate market.
company.presidentMessage2: In today's globalized world, to meet the needs of clients from diverse backgrounds, we have built a team with multilingual skills and professional expertise.
company.presidentMessage3: Real estate is one of the most important decisions in life. We understand the responsibility and always provide services from the client's perspective.
company.philosophyDescription: Our core values and guiding principles
company.missionDesc: Provide professional services to diverse clients, creating better living and investment opportunities through real estate.
company.visionDesc: To become the leading provider of multilingual real estate services in Tokyo and a bridge for cross-border transactions.
company.valuesDesc: Based on transparency, professionalism, and speed, we prioritize trust with clients.
company.historyDescription: The growth trajectory of Smart Eyes
company.history2021Desc: Founded with future ambitions, starting new business challenges.
company.history2022Desc: Expanded into international markets, built a strong network, gaining commercial experience and cross-cultural communication skills.
company.history2023Desc: Leveraged commercial experience to identify market opportunities, systematically invest in quality projects, and build a diversified portfolio.
company.history2024Desc: Managed properties meticulously, provided quality living experiences, established efficient property management systems, and gained extensive operational experience.
company.history2025Desc: Built on years of experience, officially offering professional brokerage services, integrating premium properties, and providing comprehensive solutions to clients, aiming to be a trusted partner.
company.teamDescription: A professional team with diverse expertise
company.infoBusinessValue: Real Estate Sales Brokerage · Rental Brokerage · Investment Consulting
